name: WhatsApp Mini
description: Whatsapp Style for a small window. Very useful if you create a web app shortcut with google chrome.
additional_info:
Only tested with Chrome!
(Optional) Scale zoom for http://web.whatsapp.com to 75% and set the text size to "Big".
To create a chrome app shortcut and set the window position and window size to a fixed value read the following tutorial (tutorial is not from me): https://solariz.de/de/whatsapp-desktop-standalone-app-windows.htm
